text: hello this is chef john from Food Wishes
calm with a fantastic holiday
gift-giving idea that's right my friends
of all recipes have recently launched a
series of culinary classes which would
make the perfect gift for any aspiring
cooks on your list and of course you
could teach them yourself using all the
skills you learn watching Food Wishes
videos but this is going to be way
faster and easier simply go to cooking
school down allrecipes.com and click on
the give a gift link at the top of the
page and that's it and not only will
they be getting a very unique very
special gift you eventually will be the
beneficiary their newly found culinary
skills so basically everybody wins okay
so i invite you to go check that out and
as always enjoy
